pastInspirations.q: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
pastInspirations.h:
“A day without laughter is a day wasted.” —
Charlie Chaplin

pastInspirations.q: As long as a human being worries about when he will die, and what he has that is his, all of his works are zero.
pastInspirations.h:
“As long as a human being worries about when he will die, and what he has that is his, all of his works are zero.” —
Kabir

pastInspirations.q: He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command.
pastInspirations.h:
“He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command.” —
Niccolo Machiavelli

pastInspirations.q: It's very important to like the people you work with, otherwise life and your job is gonna be quite miserable.
pastInspirations.h:
“It's very important to like the people you work with, otherwise life and your job is gonna be quite miserable.” —
Elon Musk

pastInspirations.q: Short cuts make long delays.
pastInspirations.h:
“Short cuts make long delays.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

pastInspirations.q: An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.
pastInspirations.h:
“An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.” —
Laurence J. Peter

pastInspirations.q: The quality of your commitments will determine the course of your life.
pastInspirations.h:
“The quality of your commitments will determine the course of your life.” —
Ralph Marston

pastInspirations.q: Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.
pastInspirations.h:
“Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.” —
Bob Marley

pastInspirations.q: We will act consistently with our view of who we truly are, whether that view is accurate or not.
pastInspirations.h:
“We will act consistently with our view of who we truly are, whether that view is accurate or not.” —
Tony Robbins

pastInspirations.q: Happiness is an effect of doing what you love, not an end goal to be achieved.
pastInspirations.h:
“Happiness is an effect of doing what you love, not an end goal to be achieved.” —
Celestine Chua

pastInspirations.q: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
pastInspirations.h:
“To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all. ” —
Oscar Wilde

pastInspirations.q: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
pastInspirations.h:
“A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.” —
Jonathan Swift

pastInspirations.q: Life may be full of pain but that's not an excuse to give up.
pastInspirations.h:
“Life may be full of pain but that's not an excuse to give up.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

pastInspirations.q: What would you do if you weren't afraid?
pastInspirations.h:
“What would you do if you weren't afraid?” —
Spencer Johnson

pastInspirations.q: Life has the name of life, but in reality it is death.
pastInspirations.h:
“Life has the name of life, but in reality it is death.” —
Heraclitus

pastInspirations.q: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
pastInspirations.h:
“Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice. ” —
Henry Ford

pastInspirations.q: Remember where you came from, where you're going, and why you created this mess you got yourself into in the first place.
pastInspirations.h:
“Remember where you came from, where you're going, and why you created this mess you got yourself into in the first place.” —
Richard Bach

pastInspirations.q: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
pastInspirations.h:
“Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.” —
Albert Einstein

pastInspirations.q: It is children only who enjoy the present; their elders either live on the memory of the past or the hope of the future.
pastInspirations.h:
“It is children only who enjoy the present; their elders either live on the memory of the past or the hope of the future.” —
Nicolas Chamfort

pastInspirations.q: Either get busy living or get busy dying.
pastInspirations.h:
“Either get busy living or get busy dying.” —
Stephen King

pastInspirations.q: If you care about someone enough, you'll always be there for them no matter what.
pastInspirations.h:
“If you care about someone enough, you'll always be there for them no matter what.” —
Roy T. Bennett

pastInspirations.q: Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
pastInspirations.h:
“Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.” —
Robin Sharma

pastInspirations.q: Great minds are always feared by lesser minds.
pastInspirations.h:
“Great minds are always feared by lesser minds.” —
Dan Brown

pastInspirations.q: It is better to light a single candle than to curse the darkness.
pastInspirations.h:
“It is better to light a single candle than to curse the darkness.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

pastInspirations.q: A gentleman accepts the responsibility of his actions and bears the burden of their consequences.
pastInspirations.h:
“A gentleman accepts the responsibility of his actions and bears the burden of their consequences.” —
William Faulkner

pastInspirations.q: It is startling to realize how much unbelief is necessary to make belief possible.
pastInspirations.h:
“It is startling to realize how much unbelief is necessary to make belief possible.” —
Eric Hoffer

pastInspirations.q: The nearer a man comes to a calm mind, the closer he is to strength.
pastInspirations.h:
“The nearer a man comes to a calm mind, the closer he is to strength.” —
Marcus Aurelius

pastInspirations.q: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make, the better.
pastInspirations.h:
“All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make, the better.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson

pastInspirations.q: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
pastInspirations.h:
“Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.” —
Roy T. Bennett

pastInspirations.q: The most important thing is to enjoy your life, to be happy, it's all that matters.
pastInspirations.h:
“The most important thing is to enjoy your life, to be happy, it's all that matters.” —
Audrey Hepburn

pastInspirations.q: The goal is not to be perfect by the end, the goal is to be better today.
pastInspirations.h:
“The goal is not to be perfect by the end, the goal is to be better today.” —
Simon Sinek

pastInspirations.q: We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.
pastInspirations.h:
“We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.” —
D. H. Lawrence

pastInspirations.q: Change is hardest at the beginning, messiest in the middle and best at the end.
pastInspirations.h:
“Change is hardest at the beginning, messiest in the middle and best at the end.” —
Robin Sharma

pastInspirations.q: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
pastInspirations.h:
“If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.” —
Meister Eckhart

pastInspirations.q: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.
pastInspirations.h:
“If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.” —
Napoleon Hill

pastInspirations.q: The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him.
pastInspirations.h:
“The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

pastInspirations.q: Most of the important things in the world have been accompanied by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
pastInspirations.h:
“Most of the important things in the world have been accompanied by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.” —
Dale Carnegie

pastInspirations.q: The way to change others' minds is with affection, and not anger.
pastInspirations.h:
“The way to change others' minds is with affection, and not anger.” —
Dalai Lama

pastInspirations.q: Everyone sees what you appear to be, few experience what you really are.
pastInspirations.h:
“Everyone sees what you appear to be, few experience what you really are.” —
Niccolo Machiavelli

pastInspirations.q: Peace is letting it be. Letting life flow, letting emotions flow through you.
pastInspirations.h:
“Peace is letting it be. Letting life flow, letting emotions flow through you.” —
Kamal Ravikant

pastInspirations.q: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.
pastInspirations.h:
“Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.” —
Carol Burnett

pastInspirations.q: Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.
pastInspirations.h:
“Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.” —
Og Mandino

pastInspirations.q: Meditate. It won't be fun but it will surface what you need to deal with.
pastInspirations.h:
“Meditate. It won't be fun but it will surface what you need to deal with.” —
Naval Ravikant

pastInspirations.q: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
pastInspirations.h:
“Either you run the day or the day runs you.” —
Jim Rohn

pastInspirations.q: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
pastInspirations.h:
“Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.” —
Conrad Hilton

pastInspirations.q: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
pastInspirations.h:
“Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.” —
Albus Dumbledore

pastInspirations.q: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
pastInspirations.h:
“The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.” —
Robert Greene

pastInspirations.q: Success is built sequentially. It's one thing at a time.
pastInspirations.h:
“Success is built sequentially. It's one thing at a time.” —
Gary Keller

pastInspirations.q: If you want to feel happy, do something for yourself. If you want to feel fulfilled, do something for someone else.
pastInspirations.h:
“If you want to feel happy, do something for yourself. If you want to feel fulfilled, do something for someone else.” —
Simon Sinek

pastInspirations.q: People are not disturbed by things, but by the views they take of them.
pastInspirations.h:
“People are not disturbed by things, but by the views they take of them.” —
Epictetus

pastInspirations.q: The less people know, the more stubbornly they know it.
pastInspirations.h:
“The less people know, the more stubbornly they know it.” —
Osho

pastInspirations.q: Lying can never save us from another lie.
pastInspirations.h:
“Lying can never save us from another lie.” —
Vaclav Havel

pastInspirations.q: To get angry is like to revenge yourself for the guilt of others.
pastInspirations.h:
“To get angry is like to revenge yourself for the guilt of others.” —
Jonathan Swift

pastInspirations.q: If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.
pastInspirations.h:
“If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.” —
Criss Jami

pastInspirations.q: Life is trying things to see if they work.
pastInspirations.h:
“Life is trying things to see if they work.” —
Ray Bradbury

pastInspirations.q: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.
pastInspirations.h:
“The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.” —
Alan Watts

pastInspirations.q: Failing is another stepping stone to greatness.
pastInspirations.h:
“Failing is another stepping stone to greatness.” —
Oprah Winfrey

pastInspirations.q: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken
pastInspirations.h:
“Be yourself; everyone else is already taken ” —
Oscar Wilde

pastInspirations.q: There is no such thing as a great talent without great willpower.
pastInspirations.h:
“There is no such thing as a great talent without great willpower.” —
Honore de Balzac

pastInspirations.q: Nothing can survive without food. Everything we consume acts either to heal us or to poison us.
pastInspirations.h:
“Nothing can survive without food. Everything we consume acts either to heal us or to poison us.” —
Thich Nhat Hanh

pastInspirations.q: The major difference between the big shot and the little shot is the big shot is just a little shot who kept on shooting.
pastInspirations.h:
“The major difference between the big shot and the little shot is the big shot is just a little shot who kept on shooting.” —
Zig Ziglar

pastInspirations.q: The truth is simple. If it was complicated, everyone would understand it.
pastInspirations.h:
“The truth is simple. If it was complicated, everyone would understand it.” —
Walt Whitman

pastInspirations.q: If you get up one more time than you fall, you will make it through.
pastInspirations.h:
“If you get up one more time than you fall, you will make it through.” —
Chinese Proverb

pastInspirations.q: Learn from the rejection and turn it into an opportunity!
pastInspirations.h:
“Learn from the rejection and turn it into an opportunity!” —
Mary Engelbreit

pastInspirations.q: The prettiest eyes have cried the most.
pastInspirations.h:
“The prettiest eyes have cried the most.” —
Unknown

pastInspirations.q: Get mad, then get over it.
pastInspirations.h:
“Get mad, then get over it.” —
Colin Powell

pastInspirations.q: Men learn to love the woman they are attracted to. Women learn to become attracted to the man they fall in love with.
pastInspirations.h:
“Men learn to love the woman they are attracted to. Women learn to become attracted to the man they fall in love with.” —
Woody Allen

pastInspirations.q: Everyone you admire was once a beginner.
pastInspirations.h:
“Everyone you admire was once a beginner.” —
Jack Butcher

pastInspirations.q: I've always lived in the moment.
pastInspirations.h:
“I've always lived in the moment.” —
Yanni

pastInspirations.q: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
pastInspirations.h:
“We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations. ” —
Charles Swindoll

pastInspirations.q: Your work is to discover your work and then, with all your heart, to give yourself to it.
pastInspirations.h:
“Your work is to discover your work and then, with all your heart, to give yourself to it.” —
Buddha

pastInspirations.q: Integrity is telling myself the truth. And honesty is telling the truth to other people.
pastInspirations.h:
“Integrity is telling myself the truth. And honesty is telling the truth to other people.” —
Spencer Johnson

pastInspirations.q: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.
pastInspirations.h:
“In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.” —
Thomas Jefferson

pastInspirations.q: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
pastInspirations.h:
“Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life. ” —
Confucius

pastInspirations.q: I must also have a dark side if I am to be whole.
pastInspirations.h:
“I must also have a dark side if I am to be whole.” —
Carl Jung

pastInspirations.q: To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power.
pastInspirations.h:
“To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power.” —
Ayn Rand

pastInspirations.q: Don't let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
pastInspirations.h:
“Don't let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.” —
Dalai Lama

pastInspirations.q: When one door closes another door opens.
pastInspirations.h:
“When one door closes another door opens. ” —
Alexander Graham Bell

pastInspirations.q: The person who says something is impossible should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
pastInspirations.h:
“The person who says something is impossible should not interrupt the person who is doing it.” —
Chinese Proverb

pastInspirations.q: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
pastInspirations.h:
“Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life. ” —
Seneca

pastInspirations.q: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow know what you truly want to become.
pastInspirations.h:
“Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow know what you truly want to become.” —
Steve Jobs

pastInspirations.q: If we are honest with ourselves, most of us will have to admit that we live out our lives in an ocean of fear.
pastInspirations.h:
“If we are honest with ourselves, most of us will have to admit that we live out our lives in an ocean of fear.” —
Jon Kabat-Zinn

pastInspirations.q: First comes the shy wish. Then you must have the heart to have the dream. Then, you work, and work.
pastInspirations.h:
“First comes the shy wish. Then you must have the heart to have the dream. Then, you work, and work. ” —
Estee Lauder

pastInspirations.q: Your friends will know you better in the first minute you meet than your acquaintances will know you in a thousand years.
pastInspirations.h:
“Your friends will know you better in the first minute you meet than your acquaintances will know you in a thousand years.” —
Richard Bach

pastInspirations.q: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.
pastInspirations.h:
“Opportunities multiply as they are seized.” —
Sun Tzu

pastInspirations.q: He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.
pastInspirations.h:
“He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.” —
Epictetus

pastInspirations.q: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
pastInspirations.h:
“In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.” —
Dalai Lama

pastInspirations.q: We must create our own world or we will die from inaction.
pastInspirations.h:
“We must create our own world or we will die from inaction.” —
Robert Greene

pastInspirations.q: Shoot for the moon, because even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
pastInspirations.h:
“Shoot for the moon, because even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.” —
Les Brown

pastInspirations.q: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
pastInspirations.h:
“The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.” —
Charles Dickens

pastInspirations.q: When you are totally at peace with yourself, nothing can shake you.
pastInspirations.h:
“When you are totally at peace with yourself, nothing can shake you.” —
Deepam Chaterjee

pastInspirations.q: If you can't, you must. If you must, you can.
pastInspirations.h:
“If you can't, you must. If you must, you can.” —
Tony Robbins

pastInspirations.q: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
pastInspirations.h:
“Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.” —
A.A. Milne

pastInspirations.q: It's better to stand by someone's side than by yourself.
pastInspirations.h:
“It's better to stand by someone's side than by yourself.” —
Jack London

pastInspirations.q: I am always doing what I cannot do yet, in order to learn how to do it.
pastInspirations.h:
“I am always doing what I cannot do yet, in order to learn how to do it.” —
Vincent van Gogh

pastInspirations.q: Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.
pastInspirations.h:
“Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.” —
Ayn Rand

pastInspirations.q: If you can see it in your mind, you can hold it in your mind.
pastInspirations.h:
“If you can see it in your mind, you can hold it in your mind.” —
Steve Harvey

pastInspirations.q: Courage is the willingness to engage in a risk-taking behavior regardless of whether the consequences are unknown or possibly adverse.
pastInspirations.h:
“Courage is the willingness to engage in a risk-taking behavior regardless of whether the consequences are unknown or possibly adverse.” —
Alfred Adler

pastInspirations.q: Don't waste time on excuses. Just get it done.
pastInspirations.h:
“Don't waste time on excuses. Just get it done.” —
Ralph Marston

pastInspirations.q: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
pastInspirations.h:
“Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.” —
Vincent van Gogh

pastInspirations.q: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.
pastInspirations.h:
“Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.” —
William James

pastInspirations.q: Your mind will make you rich or poor, depending on the use you put to it.
pastInspirations.h:
“Your mind will make you rich or poor, depending on the use you put to it.” —
Brian Tracy

pastInspirations.q: Only he who has no use for the empire is fit to be entrusted with it.
pastInspirations.h:
“Only he who has no use for the empire is fit to be entrusted with it.” —
Zhuangzi

pastInspirations.q: A good master leads you to the true master within. Only that master, who is your own higher self, can adequately answer all questions.
pastInspirations.h:
“A good master leads you to the true master within. Only that master, who is your own higher self, can adequately answer all questions.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

pastInspirations.q: No man is happy who does not think himself so.
pastInspirations.h:
“No man is happy who does not think himself so.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

pastInspirations.q: He will win who knows when to fight and when not to fight.
pastInspirations.h:
“He will win who knows when to fight and when not to fight.” —
Sun Tzu

pastInspirations.q: Everything great that has ever happened to humanity has begun as a single thought in someone's mind.
pastInspirations.h:
“Everything great that has ever happened to humanity has begun as a single thought in someone's mind.” —
Yanni

pastInspirations.q: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
pastInspirations.h:
“Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.” —
William Faulkner

pastInspirations.q: Confuse them with your silence and amaze them with your actions.
pastInspirations.h:
“Confuse them with your silence and amaze them with your actions.” —
Unknown

pastInspirations.q: There is peace even in the storm.
pastInspirations.h:
“There is peace even in the storm.” —
Vincent van Gogh

pastInspirations.q: The best dreams happen when you're awake.
pastInspirations.h:
“The best dreams happen when you're awake.” —
Cherie Gilderbloom

pastInspirations.q: 20 percent of your activities will account for 80 percent of your results.
pastInspirations.h:
“20 percent of your activities will account for 80 percent of your results.” —
Brian Tracy

pastInspirations.q: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
pastInspirations.h:
“People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.” —
Dale Carnegie

pastInspirations.q: Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.
pastInspirations.h:
“Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.” —
Bob Marley

pastInspirations.q: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
pastInspirations.h:
“The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.” —
Walt Disney

pastInspirations.q: The first step is to establish that something is possible; then probability will occur.
pastInspirations.h:
“The first step is to establish that something is possible; then probability will occur.” —
Elon Musk

pastInspirations.q: Leadership starts at the top.
pastInspirations.h:
“Leadership starts at the top.” —
Morgan Wootten

pastInspirations.q: The road to success is always under construction..
pastInspirations.h:
“The road to success is always under construction..” —
Lily Tomlin

pastInspirations.q: Many people spend more time looking at their failures than focusing on their successes.
pastInspirations.h:
“Many people spend more time looking at their failures than focusing on their successes.” —
Lolly Daskal

pastInspirations.q: It is better to be looked over than overlooked.
pastInspirations.h:
“It is better to be looked over than overlooked.” —
Mae West

pastInspirations.q: Looking after my health today gives me a better hope for tomorrow.
pastInspirations.h:
“Looking after my health today gives me a better hope for tomorrow. ” —
Anne Wilson Schaef

pastInspirations.q: The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.
pastInspirations.h:
“The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.” —
Alexander Graham Bell

pastInspirations.q: If the happiness and prosperity of other people depend on you, you have nothing to fear anymore.
pastInspirations.h:
“If the happiness and prosperity of other people depend on you, you have nothing to fear anymore.” —
Robert Greene

pastInspirations.q: What one does is what counts. Not what one had the intention of doing.
pastInspirations.h:
“What one does is what counts. Not what one had the intention of doing.” —
Pablo Picasso

pastInspirations.q: He suffers more than necessary, who suffers before it is necessary.
pastInspirations.h:
“He suffers more than necessary, who suffers before it is necessary. ” —
Seneca

pastInspirations.q: In nature there is no alienation. Everything belongs.
pastInspirations.h:
“In nature there is no alienation. Everything belongs.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

pastInspirations.q: Either get busy living or get busy dying.
pastInspirations.h:
“Either get busy living or get busy dying.” —
Stephen King

pastInspirations.q: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
pastInspirations.h:
“When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.” —
Elon Musk

pastInspirations.q: Conscience is a dog that does not stop us from passing but that we cannot prevent from barking.
pastInspirations.h:
“Conscience is a dog that does not stop us from passing but that we cannot prevent from barking.” —
Nicolas Chamfort

inspirationOfDay.q: The less people know, the more stubbornly they know it.
inspirationOfDay.h:
“The less people know, the more stubbornly they know it.” —
Osho
